mapper.select: select cs.id, cs.service_type, cs.service_title, cs.service_state, c.name as "customer.name", u.name as "createdby.name", cs.create_date, cs.allot_date, cs.deal_date, cs.deal_result, cs.satisfy, cs.service_deal, cs.service_request, ua.name as "allotTo.name" from customer_services cs left join customers c on cs.customer_id = c.id left join users u on cs.created_id = u.id left join users ua on cs.allot_id = ua.id where cs.id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from customer_services cs where cs.id = #{id}
